Fact.Name: Taxable refunds of state and local taxes
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 1. Taxable refunds, credits, or offsets of state and local income taxes.

Fact.Name: Alimony received
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 2a. Alimony received.

Fact.Name: Business income or loss
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 3. Business income or (loss) from Schedule C.

Fact.Name: Other gains or losses
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 4. Other gains or (losses) from Form 4797 or Form 4684.

Fact.Name: Rental, partnership, S corp income
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 5. Rental real estate, royalties, partnerships, S corporations, trusts, etc. from Schedule E.

Fact.Name: Farm income or loss
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 6. Farm income or (loss) from Schedule F.

Fact.Name: Unemployment compensation
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 7. Unemployment compensation.

Fact.Name: Net operating loss
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8a. Net operating loss.

Fact.Name: Gambling income
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8b. Gambling income.

Fact.Name: Cancellation of debt
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8c. Cancellation of debt.

Fact.Name: Foreign earned income exclusion
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8d. Foreign earned income exclusion from Form 2555.

Fact.Name: Income from Form 8853
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8e. Income from Form 8853.

Fact.Name: Income from Form 8889
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8f. Income from Form 8889.

Fact.Name: Alaska Permanent Fund dividends
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8g. Alaska Permanent Fund dividends.

Fact.Name: Jury duty pay
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8h. Jury duty pay.

Fact.Name: Prizes and awards
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8i. Prizes and awards.

Fact.Name: Activity not for profit income
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8j. Activity not engaged in for profit income.

Fact.Name: Stock options
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8k. Stock options.

Fact.Name: Rental of personal property
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8l. Income from rental of personal property engaged in for profit.

Fact.Name: Olympic and Paralympic medals
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8m. Olympic and Paralympic medals and USOC prize money.

Fact.Name: Section 951(a) inclusion
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8n. Section 951(a) inclusion.

Fact.Name: Section 951A(a) inclusion
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8o. Section 951A(a) inclusion.

Fact.Name: Excess business loss adjustment
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8p. Section 461(l) excess business loss adjustment.

Fact.Name: ABLE account distributions
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8q. Taxable distributions from an ABLE account.

Fact.Name: Scholarship and fellowship grants
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8r. Scholarship and fellowship grants not reported on Form W-2.

Fact.Name: Nontaxable Medicaid waiver payments
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8s. Nontaxable amount of Medicaid waiver payments included on Form 1040, line 1a or 1d.

Fact.Name: Nonqualified deferred compensation
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8t. Pension or annuity from a nonqualified deferred compensation plan or nongovernmental section 457 plan.

Fact.Name: Wages while incarcerated
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8u. Wages earned while incarcerated.

Fact.Name: Digital assets
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8v. Digital assets received as ordinary income not reported elsewhere.

Fact.Name: Other income
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 8z. Other income not listed on lines 8a through 8v.

Fact.Name: Total other income
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 9. Add lines 8a through 8z.

Fact.Name: Total additional income
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 10. Combine lines 1 through 7 and 9. Enter here and on Form 1040, line 8.

Fact.Name: Educator expenses
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 11. Educator expenses.

Fact.Name: Reservist business expenses
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 12. Certain business expenses of reservists, performing artists, and fee-basis government officials.

Fact.Name: HSA deduction
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 13. Health savings account deduction from Form 8889.

Fact.Name: Moving expenses
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 14. Moving expenses for members of the Armed Forces from Form 3903.

Fact.Name: Self-employment tax deduction
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 15. Deductible part of self-employment tax from Schedule SE.

Fact.Name: SEP, SIMPLE, and qualified plans
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 16. Self-employed SEP, SIMPLE, and qualified plans.

Fact.Name: Self-employed health insurance
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 17. Self-employed health insurance deduction.

Fact.Name: Early withdrawal penalty
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 18. Penalty on early withdrawal of savings.

Fact.Name: Alimony paid
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 19a. Alimony paid.

Fact.Name: IRA deduction
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 20. IRA deduction.

Fact.Name: Student loan interest deduction
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 21. Student loan interest deduction.

Fact.Name: Archer MSA deduction
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 23. Archer MSA deduction.

Fact.Name: Jury duty pay adjustment
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24a. Jury duty pay turned over to employer.

Fact.Name: Personal property rental expenses
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24b. Deductible expenses related to income reported on line 8l from the rental of personal property engaged in for profit.

Fact.Name: Olympic medals nontaxable amount
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24c. Nontaxable amount of the value of Olympic and Paralympic medals and USOC prize money reported on line 8m.

Fact.Name: Reforestation amortization
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24d. Reforestation amortization and expenses.

Fact.Name: Trade Act repayment
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24e. Repayment of supplemental unemployment benefits under the Trade Act of 1974.

Fact.Name: 501(c)(18)(D) contributions
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24f. Contributions to section 501(c)(18)(D) pension plans.

Fact.Name: Chaplain 403(b) contributions
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24g. Contributions by certain chaplains to section 403(b) plans.

Fact.Name: Attorney fees for discrimination claims
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24h. Attorney fees and court costs for actions involving certain unlawful discrimination claims.

Fact.Name: Attorney fees for IRS whistleblower
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24i. Attorney fees and court costs paid in connection with an award from the IRS for information that helped detect tax law violations.

Fact.Name: Housing deduction
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24j. Housing deduction from Form 2555.

Fact.Name: Excess section 67(e) deductions
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24k. Excess deductions of section 67(e) expenses from Schedule K-1 (Form 1041).

Fact.Name: Other adjustments
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 24z. Other adjustments not listed on lines 24a through 24k.

Fact.Name: Total other adjustments
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 25. Add lines 24a through 24z.

Fact.Name: Total adjustments to income
Fact.Description: Schedule 1 line 26. Add lines 11 through 23 and 25. Enter here and on Form 1040, line 10.
